title: Bug 3666 - Code Completion Hungry code assist
OB: Under certain circumstances, the code assist generates `baz(x.foo())` instead of `baz(x.foo(), x.foo())`.
EB: The code assist should generate `baz(x.foo(), x.foo())` instead of `baz(x.foo())`.
SR:
1. Create a class X with the provided code.
2. Call the `bar` method passing an instance of X.
